issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Remove recursive dependencies of credential providers in LdapGroupsMapping

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: LdapGroupsMapping Should use configuration.getPassword for SSL and LDAP Passwords

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: When IOException throws in getPassword(), getPassword() return null String,  this will cause setConf() throws java.lang.NullPointerException when check isEmpty() on null string.
fields.summary: LdapGroupsMapping getPassward shouldn't return null when IOException throws

The fix looks good to me. Thanks [~liangvls@gmail.com] for the contribution.
Would you also like to add a regression test?
